entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Blizzard developing after midnight. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
